website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced e-bike with all the basic functions you'd want.
pros: Gets high customer ratings for both component quality and sturdiness
Includes a rear rack to make it easy to transport supplies and groceries
Hydraulic front fork to handle all terrain
cons: Assembly directions aren't easy to follow (but online tutorials are available)

customer_reviews.title: Everything was fine until bike was about 18 months old
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until bike was about 18 months old. Now battery will cut out randomly when about 2 miles into ride. Battery still fully charged. Suspect thermistor. Used the bike for a fun commute. Now not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike had over a year now and still running great
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Fun Mountain Bike
customer_reviews.text: The good: Nice looking and sturdy bike. They do honor their warranty. The not so good: When bike arrived the battery would not charge. Had to send both the battery and charger back to them for testing. At my out of pocket expense. Purchased the bike on 12/26/2014 and today 2/10/2015 I received the warranty replacement battery. With the replacement battery the bike is working well. If nothing else goes wrong, I consider this a good deal for a electric mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Below average electric bike for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: First off there were no instructions to be found. Vague help from the owners manual. The bike arrived a little roughed up from shipping. The headlight is not even close to what is seen in the picture. The one included does not even fit on the bike. I had to buy another after market one that fit. The rear tire rack is nearly impossible to get on. That along doubled my assembly time. When assembled you can expect to have much fun and enjoyment. Once I had the battery charged and went on a test drive I had a hard time getting off.
customer_reviews.author: Arie Griffioen

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: i expected to be disappointed but am quite pleased with everything on this bike. It feels good, easy to get on and very easy to operate. The disc brakes are great and the electric assist is just right. Instruction manual could be better, doesn't cover the accessories. Quick simple assembly especially if you are familiar with standard bikes. A real buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed the customer service I received from X-Treme Scooters. There was some confusion as to exactly which model I had ordered and I received an email and two telephone calls from the company to make sure everything was what I had wanted. The bike runs well and my son is using it to commute to work in Austin, TX.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, long range.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is really awesome, it took me an hour to put together, and it really does go about 20-40 miles on a charge depending on how much you pedal.
customer_reviews.author: MGR

customer_reviews.title: Great e-bike.
customer_reviews.text: I ride this to work every day. And I love it.
customer_reviews.author: rosstheboss

customer_reviews.title: oyea
customer_reviews.text: looks good ,feels good,does what it says with the amount of distance and speed.I now have super legs,and have yet to break a sweat
customer_reviews.author: Edmund J. Pawlowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bike, rides it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised, but already in the repair shop.
customer_reviews.text: This item worked as advertised and was not too difficult for someone with basic tools and knowledge to assemble. However, one week after I started using it, it broke and had to go to the repair shop.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: its only to go around not for delivery work. The battery time is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Isaias B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike without electric system. And bad company seller. I regret that I lost my $850.00
customer_reviews.author: Ayikoe AYIH

customer_reviews.title: What a POS!!!
customer_reviews.text: First the bike came damaged. I had to get a local shop to weld the luggage rack brackets back on. Second, after I had owned it 80 days, I hit a bump on the bike trail and the electric died. The warranty process is designed to keep you from communicating directly with them. You have to start a ticket and then maybe they will get back to you. Then they send you something that they think might fix your problem and it doesn't. Then you have to start over. Now I am stuck with a piece of junk. Don't do business with these folks. You will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: phardog

customer_reviews.title: Barb
customer_reviews.text: Have owned the bike for 8 months and love it. I live in Florida where it is flat, and the motor alone will carry me 18 MPH. Battery range is 15+ miles. Had to replace the tire innertubes with jell filled tubes to avoid flats. Bike is smoothe and quiet, and a pleasure to ride. The stock seat is comfortable but I upgraded to a Schwinn delux seat. Overall quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: barbara carrier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Assembly instructions could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Trovato

product_meta.title: X-Treme Scooters Men's Lithium Electric Powered Mountain Bike
product_meta.description: The Trail Maker is a Lithium Battery powered Electric Bicycle, running on a 300 Watt rear hub motor. Made with all top of the line components this model includes a 7 Speed Shimano Tourney Gears and Shifter System, 7 Lightweight Lithium Ion Batteries, a 100 precent Aluminum Alloy Frame, fully Adjustable Seat, and an RST Capa T7 front fork. Ready for the road and trail, the X-Treme Scooters Lithium Powered Mountain Bike provides a fun transport option. Equipped with lightweight lithium battery technology, the Lithium Powered Bicycle can travel for up to 25 miles per charge and goes 20 miles per hour. With high-quality mountain bike components, the bike is set up for traditional riding as well as motor operation. The Lithium Powered Electric Bicycle has a 300-Watt rear brushless hub motor for power operation. The bike has a key start and a variable speed control twist throttle. The bike can be powered exclusively by the motor, can be pedaled and power assisted, or be exclusively pedaled. Mountain bike components that make the bike great for trail and road riding include a seven-speed Shimano Tourney Gears Shifter System, lightweight 100 percent aluminum alloy frame, fully adjustable seat, and a RST Capa T7 hydraulic front fork for maximum shock absorption. The bike is also equipped with strong front and rear brakes, a battery indicator, a headlight, tool kit, and cargo rack. The Lithium Powered Bicycle features state-of-the-art, lightweight battery technology that powers the 300-Watt motor. The bike is equipped with seven Lightweight Lithium LiMn04 Ion batteries with a life of seven to 10 years. The bike runs for 20 to 25 miles per charge and can still be pedal operated when out of battery power. A smart charger is included with the bike. Specifications: Power: Electric Motor type: Brushless hub motor Motor in center of rear wheel Drive system: Rear hub motor (motor is in rear rim) and pedal power. This is a non returnable item. Some Assembly is required.
feature_bullets: Easy DIY assembly, no expert help needed.
Made with all top of the line components this model includes a 7 speed shimano tourney gears and shifter system 7 lightweight lithium ion batteries.
The Trail Maker is a lithium battery powered electric bicycle, running on a 300 watt rear hub motor.
